Tarti:
In the Hive Hills(alt+B) you will find Cardiff WereWolf, Monster Eye Destroyer and Silenos.
I think Silenos might have something to do with the curse. I've heard that you can gain a Secret Material if you defeat Cardiff WereWolf, Monster Eye Destroyer and Silenos.
Find the Secret Material and give it to Guard Kallesin.
I don't want you to get lost on your way to the Paths so I'll send you right there.
